problem_text:
5.5-3. Let $X$ equal the widest diameter (in millimeters) of the fetal head measured between the 16th and 25th weeks of pregnancy. Assume that the distribution of $X$ is $N(46.58,40.96)$. Let $\bar{X}$ be the sample mean of a random sample of $n=16$ observations of $X$.
(b) Find $P(44.42 \leq \bar{X} \leq 48.98)$.
